title: Implement responsive design across entire application

requirements.text: Make the location selection modal (displaying 'Konum Değiştir' header with location like 'Gebze, Kocaeli İli, Türkiye') responsive and appropriately sized for mobile devices

quotes: Konum Değiştir Gebze, Kocaeli İli, Türkiye bu pencereden bahsediyorum

acceptanceCriteria: Location selection modal is compact and properly sized on mobile screens
Modal content (header, location text, buttons) scales appropriately
Modal does not overflow screen boundaries on small devices

requirements.text: Implement responsive layouts for all application screens using Tailwind CSS breakpoints (sm, md, lg, xl) to optimize for mobile phones, tablets, and desktop computers
acceptanceCriteria: All screens render appropriately on mobile phone screens (< 640px)
All screens adapt properly for tablet screens (640px - 1024px)
All screens display optimally on desktop screens (> 1024px)
Navigation, headers, and footers adjust based on screen size

requirements.text: Make typography (text sizes, line heights) responsive across all components and screens using Tailwind's responsive text utilities
acceptanceCriteria: Headings scale appropriately across breakpoints
Body text is readable on all device sizes
Arabic text and transliterations maintain legibility

requirements.text: Make all buttons, input fields, and interactive elements responsive with appropriate sizing and touch targets for mobile devices
acceptanceCriteria: Buttons have minimum 44px touch targets on mobile
Input fields are appropriately sized for mobile keyboards
Interactive elements have adequate spacing for touch interaction

requirements.text: Adjust spacing (padding, margins, gaps) across all components to be responsive and appropriate for each breakpoint
acceptanceCriteria: Spacing is compact on mobile without feeling cramped
Spacing increases appropriately on larger screens
Content remains well-organized across all breakpoints

requirements.text: Make the prayer times display section (including daily prayer times, weekly schedule, countdown timers) responsive for all device sizes
acceptanceCriteria: Prayer time cards stack vertically on mobile
Prayer time tables are scrollable horizontally on small screens if needed
Countdown timers remain visible and readable on all devices

requirements.text: Make the tab navigation (MobileTabsNav) and overflow menu responsive with appropriate sizing and touch targets
acceptanceCriteria: Tab icons and labels are appropriately sized for mobile
Tabs are easily tappable with adequate spacing
Overflow menu items are accessible on all screen sizes

requirements.text: Make all modal dialogs and cards (prayer cards, esmaul husna cards, settings dialogs) responsive across breakpoints
acceptanceCriteria: Modals scale appropriately on mobile without overflowing
Cards maintain proper aspect ratios and readability
Dialog content is scrollable when needed on small screens

constraints: Maintain existing functionality and user flows
Preserve the Islamic visual design elements and patterns

Do not modify immutable frontend paths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui
Use only Tailwind CSS responsive utilities (sm:, md:, lg:, xl:) for breakpoints
Ensure safe area insets are maintained for Android WebView compatibility
nonGoals: Changing the application's color scheme or visual identity
Adding new features beyond responsive layout adjustments
Adding third-party UI frameworks beyond existing stack
